required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate and Compare the Bioequivalence of Two Abaloparatide-sMTS Treatments in Healthy Women.
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Randomized, 4-Period Crossover Study Evaluating the Bioequivalence of Two Abaloparatide-sMTS Treatments and the Effect of Small Variations in Wear-Time in Healthy Women.

brief_summary.textblock: A study to evaluate the bioequivalence of abaloparatide between 2 abaloparatide-sMTS treatments 300 μg treatments applied to the thigh for 5 minutes.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single site, open-label, randomized, 4-period crossover study to evaluate the bioequivalence of 2 abaloparatide-sMTS 300 μg treatments (Patheon sterile abaloparatide-sMTS and Kindeva ultra-low bioburden abaloparatide-sMTS) applied to the thigh for 5 minutes. The study will also evaluate the effect of small deviations in the wear-time of the Patheon abaloparatide-sMTS worn for 4 minutes or 7 minutes compared to the Patheon abaloparatide-sMTS worn for the prescribed 5 minutes.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: All subjects were to receive a transdermal patch containing 300 μg abaloparatide for 4,5 and 7 minutes in 4 separate periods.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC 0-t)
AUC from time 0 extrapolated to time infinity (AUC 0-∞)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjects with treatment-emergent AEs and SAEs

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patheon sMTS 5 min, then by Kindeva sMTS 5 min, then Patheon sMTS 4 min, then Patheon sMTS 7 min
arm_group.description: Abaloparatide-sMTS is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide coated onto a microstructure array for transdermal administration of abaloparatide. The abaloparatide-sMTS is manufactured at Patheon (sterile environment) or Kindeva (low bioburden environment).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Kindeva sMTS 5 min, then Patheon sMTS 7 min, then Patheon sMTS 5 min, then Patheon sMTS 4 min
arm_group.description: Abaloparatide-sMTS is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide coated onto a microstructure array for transdermal administration of abaloparatide. The abaloparatide-sMTS is manufactured at Patheon (sterile environment) or Kindeva (low bioburden environment).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patheon sMTS 4 min, then Patheon sMTS 5 min, then Patheon sMTS 7 min, then Kindeva sMTS 5 min
arm_group.description: Abaloparatide-sMTS is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide coated onto a microstructure array for transdermal administration of abaloparatide. The abaloparatide-sMTS is manufactured at Patheon (sterile environment) or Kindeva (low bioburden environment).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patheon sMTS 7 min, then Patheon sMTS 4 min, then Kindeva sMTS 5 min, then Patheon sMTS 5 min
arm_group.description: Abaloparatide-sMTS is a drug-device combination product consisting of abaloparatide coated onto a microstructure array for transdermal administration of abaloparatide. The abaloparatide-sMTS is manufactured at Patheon (sterile environment) or Kindeva (low bioburden environment).
